m_szDocTitle: The First 3D Printed Electric Vehicle | 3D Printer
m_szDocSumamry: The First 3D Printed Electric Vehicle June 9, 2014 Future , Research 3D Car , 3D Electric Car Designer and architect Michael Curry of Kansas City, Missouri has created a fully 3D printed electric vehicle, which he claims is the country’s first. Weighing in at 70 pounds, the electric vehicle is essentially a supersized RC vehicle, and is the result of several months’ work. Curry has been working on the vehicle since December 2013. A former employee of MarkerBot, Curry describes himself as a “3D printing evangelist.” Curry has always pushed the boundaries of what can and cannot be done. His 3D p
